alert.note: Alert for West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:54AM MST until January 20 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...West Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-40 between Gallup and Grants. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing snow are possible which may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
